languages.text: {n}Осторожно обернув руку тканью, Кибелла металлическими когтями отсекает лист от стебля и преподносит вам.{/n} "Будь осторож{mf|ен|на}, Домин. В нижних отсеках не стоит трогать голой рукой что ни попадя. Не думаю, что здесь дело обстоит иначе".

{n}Kibellah carefully wraps her hand in a rag, cuts one of the leaves with her metal claws, and offers it to you.{/n} "Take caution, Domin. Living in the lower bays, one quickly learns not to touch things on a whim. I doubt we should do so in this place."
languages.original_text: {n}Осторожно обернув руку тканью, Кибелла металлическими когтями отсекает лист от стебля и преподносит вам.{/n} "Будь осторож{mf|ен|на}, Домин. В нижних отсеках не стоит трогать голой рукой что ни попадя. Не думаю, что здесь дело обстоит иначе".

{n}Kibellah carefully wraps her hand in a rag, cuts one of the leaves with her metal claws, and offers it to you.{/n} "Take caution, Domin. Living in the lower bays, one quickly learns not to touch things on a whim. I doubt we should do so in this place."

{n}Kibellah carefully wraps her hand in a rag, cuts one of the leaves with her metal claws, and offers it to you.{/n} "Take caution, Domin. Living in the lower bays, one quickly learns not to touch things on a whim. I doubt we should do so in this place."

{n}Kibellah carefully wraps her hand in a rag, cuts one of the leaves with her metal claws, and offers it to you.{/n} "Take caution, Domin. Living in the lower bays, one quickly learns not to touch things on a whim. I doubt we should do so in this place."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah envuelve cuidadosamente su mano en un trapo, corta una de las hojas con sus garras de metal y te la ofrece.{/n} «Tenga cuidado, Domin. En las cubiertas inferiores, aprendemos a no tocar las cosas por capricho. Dudo que sea mejor idea hacerlo aquí».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah carefully wraps her hand in a rag, cuts one of the leaves with her metal claws, and offers it to you.{/n} "Take caution, Domin. Living in the lower bays, one quickly learns not to touch things on a whim. I doubt we should do so in this place."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah envuelve cuidadosamente su mano en un trapo, corta una de las hojas con sus garras de metal y te la ofrece.{/n} «Tenga cuidado, Domin. En las cubiertas inferiores, aprendemos a no tocar las cosas por capricho. Dudo que sea mejor idea hacerlo aquí».

languages.text: {n}キベラは丁寧に手を布巾で包み、金属の爪で葉を一枚切り、あなたに差し出した。 {/n}「気をつけてください、ドミン。下層湾に住んでいると、物に触ってはいけないということを覚えます。ここでも同じ状態でしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah carefully wraps her hand in a rag, cuts one of the leaves with her metal claws, and offers it to you.{/n} "Take caution, Domin. Living in the lower bays, one quickly learns not to touch things on a whim. I doubt we should do so in this place."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラは丁寧に手を布巾で包み、金属の爪で葉を一枚切り、あなたに差し出した。 {/n}「気をつけてください、ドミン。下層湾に住んでいると、物に触ってはいけないということを覚えます。ここでも同じ状態でしょう」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈小心翼翼地用破布包住她的手，用金属利爪切下了一片叶子，之后将叶子递给了你。{/n}“请务必当心，秘者。身处底层甲板的人，很快就会明白这个道理：不要因为一时心血来潮而乱碰东西。我认为，在这种地方也不该四处乱碰。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah carefully wraps her hand in a rag, cuts one of the leaves with her metal claws, and offers it to you.{/n} "Take caution, Domin. Living in the lower bays, one quickly learns not to touch things on a whim. I doubt we should do so in this place."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈小心翼翼地用破布包住她的手，用金属利爪切下了一片叶子，之后将叶子递给了你。{/n}“请务必当心，秘者。身处底层甲板的人，很快就会明白这个道理：不要因为一时心血来潮而乱碰东西。我认为，在这种地方也不该四处乱碰。”

languages.text: {n}Kibellah umwickelt ihre Hand sorgsam mit einem Lumpen, schneidet mit ihren Metallklauen ein Blatt ab und reicht es dir.{/n} "Seid vorsichtig, Domin. Wer in den unteren Buchten lebt, lernt bald, nichts aus Lust und Laune anzufassen. Und wir sollten das an diesem Ort auch nicht tun."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah carefully wraps her hand in a rag, cuts one of the leaves with her metal claws, and offers it to you.{/n} "Take caution, Domin. Living in the lower bays, one quickly learns not to touch things on a whim. I doubt we should do so in this place."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah umwickelt ihre Hand sorgsam mit einem Lumpen, schneidet mit ihren Metallklauen ein Blatt ab und reicht es dir.{/n} "Seid vorsichtig, Domin. Wer in den unteren Buchten lebt, lernt bald, nichts aus Lust und Laune anzufassen. Und wir sollten das an diesem Ort auch nicht tun."

languages.text: {n}La main soigneusement enveloppée dans un linge, Kibellah prélève une feuille avec ses griffes de métal avant de vous la tendre.{/n} « Prudence, Domin. Quand on vit dans les baies inférieures, on apprend vite à ne pas mettre ses mains n'importe où sans y réfléchir à deux fois. Et mon instinct me souffle que cette règle est valable ici aussi. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah carefully wraps her hand in a rag, cuts one of the leaves with her metal claws, and offers it to you.{/n} "Take caution, Domin. Living in the lower bays, one quickly learns not to touch things on a whim. I doubt we should do so in this place."

traits.locale_text: {n}La main soigneusement enveloppée dans un linge, Kibellah prélève une feuille avec ses griffes de métal avant de vous la tendre.{/n} « Prudence, Domin. Quand on vit dans les baies inférieures, on apprend vite à ne pas mettre ses mains n'importe où sans y réfléchir à deux fois. Et mon instinct me souffle que cette règle est valable ici aussi. »

languages.text: {n}Kibellah, bir kumaş parçasıyla titizlikle elini sarıyor. Metal pençesiyle yapraklardan birini keserek sana uzatıyor.{/n} "Dikkatli ol Domin. Alt güvertelerde yaşayınca fevri olarak bir şeylere dokunmaman gerektiğini hemen öğrenirsin. Burada denememiz gerektiğini sanmıyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah carefully wraps her hand in a rag, cuts one of the leaves with her metal claws, and offers it to you.{/n} "Take caution, Domin. Living in the lower bays, one quickly learns not to touch things on a whim. I doubt we should do so in this place."
